document.full_text: the head of moldova's tennis federation died of wounds sustained when a parked car blew up on tuesday in the center of the capital chisinau as he walked by, police and doctors said.
document.title: car blast in moldova kills national tennis chief
lines_and_colors: the head of moldova's tennis federation died of wounds sustained when a parked car blew up on tuesday in the center of the capital chisinau as he walked by, police and doctors said.
